page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There is a theatre and cinema combined in Sun Street known as the 'Roses Theatre'.This provides the town not only with a weekly programme of the most current and popular films,but also a very varied programme of live entertainment. The town has a museum situated in Barton Street.It was formed by the conversion of two of the oldest half-timbered buildings and restored to its present state.The tourist information office is within this building. The George Watson Memorial Hall is next to the museum and provides facilities for local clubs and for live entertainment. Named after John Moore,the Countryside Museum is housed in one of the Abbey cottages.This museum reflects his love of the countryside.
